revised_title: Deep-Sea Bivalve Morphology: A Study of the Family Verticordiidae
tldr: This study investigates the functional morphology and anatomy of 18 living species of the deep-sea family Verticordiidae, including eight new species. The research focuses on shell morphology, mantle, gills, and alimentary canal, providing insights into the relationships between the Verticordiidae and other bivalve families.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Malacology
